Learning + Creating

I love to learn, to create, and to take challenges. That's why the first time I tried coding-it was Javascript as I remembered, I immediately fall in love with it. Such passion has been motivated me to keep learning and producing new projects.

Design and Techniques

As an architect, I have learned to design, and to think practical building techniques and the connectivity between both. As a web designer and developer, I am always trying to find creative solutions to support design with best technique practices.
